name: pharaonic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging or relating to a pharaoh (= a king of ancient Egypt): We visited Luxor and marvelled at the pharaonic monuments. The museum has hundreds of items of Pharaonic art on display.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Valley of the Kings is the most famous pharaonic burial ground in Egypt.An image of a snake appeared on the pharaonic crown.The site of the capital varied throughout the Pharaonic period.
